component_values.description: The list of add-ons subscribed to.

items.description: A component value for a subscription.

name.description: The name of the component value.

price.description: The unit price for the component value.

value.description: The amount of the component value assigned.

currency.description: The monetary unit in which pricing information is displayed.

current_period_end.description: The end of the current period and also when the next billing is due.

current_period_start.description: When the current billing period started. May match initial_period_start if this is the first period.

frequency.description: How often the subscription is renewed automatically.

price.description: The price of the subscription that will be billed, in US dollars.

rate_plan.description: The rate plan applied to the subscription.

currency.description: The currency applied to the rate plan subscription.

externally_managed.description: Whether this rate plan is managed externally from Cloudflare.

id.description: The ID of the rate plan.

is_contract.description: Whether a rate plan is enterprise-based (or newly adopted term contract).

public_name.description: The full name of the rate plan.

scope.description: The scope that this rate plan applies to.

sets.description: The list of sets this rate plan applies to.

state.description: The state that the subscription is in.

zone.description: A simple zone object. May have null properties if not a zone subscription.
